title: Unknown Perils (3C36)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot 4 twilight tokens and exert Gandalf to prevent that wound.
Lore:	“Suddenly he stopped as if listening. Frodo became aware that all was very quiet, inside and outside.”
Rarity:	C
